reporter_caption.center: PREWITT v. CITY OF ROCHESTER HILLS, 460 Mich. 860 (1999)

caption.center: RICHARD PREWITT and JUDIE PREWITT, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. CITY OF

opinion.opinion_text: On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the August 21, 1998 decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
